text: [Music]
we have been focused more on
accelerating going faster to the cloud
we had good weather days bad weather
days we have like Peak Travel time and
we have like sale going on so we need
the systems to be able to scale up and
down to to cater to that during the
pandemic we had to keep our costs low
because like our operations got reduced
to one-fifth of what it used to be with
our systems on Prem it doesn't give us
the ability to scale down there were
days we had more number of pilots on our
flights than the number of passengers we
flew we were facing a different travel
landscape for which we didn't have any
playbooks we leaned on into the AWS map
program the migration acceleration
program is basically a toolbox to us it
provides us with all kinds of resources
that we can use for charting our path
and building that capability within
United to to make this journey so it
gave us access to the Technical
Resources who were bringing in the best
practices industry knowledge it also
gave us access to all of the digital
library that we needed to grow the cloud
skill set within our teams it gave us
access to all of the partners in the APN
Network we started churning out
applications Solutions meeting the
customer needs where like we build
products like travel ready Center
totally on AWS leveraging native
services and machine learning models our
mission at United is to unite the World
by connecting people to the moments that
matter and we are doing that using
technology
foreign
